thread.title: Lovely Old Hotel -
thread.title_full: Lovely Old Hotel - Review of Hotel Saint-Jacques, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Christine W
title: Lovely Old Hotel -
text: We had a room for three. The room was furnished and decorated quite lovely. But with our luggage ,there was barely room for the three of us to move. The bathroom also was tiny, there is something to be said about cleaning your teeth while sitting on the toilet and be able to reach the basin. We found David was very helpful. He provided us with a kettle, cups and teabags , so we could make a cup of tea in our room
